sentence.Network_en: I would qualify that by putting it into context.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会将它放入上下文中进行具体解释。

sentence.Network_en: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

sentence.Network_en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentence.Network_cn: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 上下文（context）表示当前cpu的状态，包括各种标志及寄存器的值。这里中断是运行在自己的上下文而不是进程的上下文。
语境（context）(Context)的重要性早已为伦敦学派的马利诺夫斯基和弗斯所确认。韩礼德进一步明确了语言存在于语境（context）（如会场、教室、语篇） …
C．“情境”（CONTEXT）与“情景”（SITUATION）是一个含义 D．创设问题情境要考虑学生的先前经验 21．英国的信息与通信技术课 …
，在文化的脉络 (context)中，还具有特殊的意义。例如，在文学作品中，玫瑰花出现时，它具有「爱」的意义，代表了爱情的表达。

list.abs: 这意味着，我们可以从它所从出的历史背景（historical context）与它的关系来考察它。于是，我们就可以这样追问：它是否一如它向 …
社会环境(Social Context )主要指说话人使用语言和听话人理解语言的客观共处环境，如交际场所，交际双方的身份、地位以及文化背 …
上下文菜单 (Context menu)：当用户右键单击或使用特定键盘-鼠标组合时显示的菜单。上下文菜单命令通常直接应用于已单击的内容。
执行上下文（execution context）和作用域链（scope chain）执行上下文（execution context）是 ECMAScript 规范（请看参考资料…

jx.jx_en_mean: considered together with the surrounding words or circumstances
jx.jx_cn_mean: 联系上下文；在上下文中

lj.lj_ly: the complex meaning of irony is only graspable in context.
lj.lj_ls: 讽刺的复杂含意只有联系上下文才能领会。

jx.jx_en_mean: without the surrounding words or circumstances and so not fully understandable

lj.lj_ly: the article portrayed her as domineering by dropping quotes from her out of context.
lj.lj_ls: 这篇文章通过对她的话断章取义把她描写得盛气凌人。

means.word_mean: 上下文,文章的前后关系

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting the construction of a text): from Latin contextus, from con- 'together' + texere 'to weave'

entry.def: The context of an idea or event is the general situation that relates to it, and which helps it to be understood.

example.ex: We are doing this work in the context of reforms in the economic, social and cultural spheres.
example.tran: 我们是在对经济、社会、文化诸领域进行改革的背景下从事这项工作的。

example.ex: ...the historical context in which Chaucer wrote...

entry.def: The context of a word, sentence, or text consists of the words, sentences, or text before and after it which help to make its meaning clear.

example.ex: Without a context, I would have assumed it was written by a man.
example.tran: 如果没有上下文，我会以为这是出自一名男子笔下。

entry.tran: 在上下文中;置于背景之下
entry.def: If something is seen in context or if it is put into context, it is considered together with all the factors that relate to it.

example.ex: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context...
example.tran: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

example.ex: It is important that we put Jesus into the context of history.
example.tran: 我们将耶稣置于历史环境中来看是很重要的。

entry.tran: 脱离上下文;断章取义地
entry.def: If a statement or remark is quoted out of context, the circumstances in which it was said are not correctly reported, so that it seems to mean something different from the meaning that was intended.

example.ex: Thomas says that he has been taken out of context on the issue...
example.tran: 托马斯说，在这个问题上他的话被断章取义了。

example.ex: Quotes can be manipulated and used out of context.
example.tran: 引语可能会被篡改，使用时断章取义。

means.word_mean: 1. discourse that surrounds a language unit and helps to determine its interpretation
2. the set of facts or circumstances that surround a situation or event;

auth_sentence.content: But as with all figures, context is everything.
auth_sentence.res_content: But as with all figures, context is everything.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But as with all figures, context is everything.

auth_sentence.content: In any case, the context is entirely unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content: In any case, the context is entirely unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In any case, the context is entirely unclear.

auth_sentence.content: But you cannot understand anything within a context.
auth_sentence.res_content: But you cannot understand anything within a context.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But you cannot understand anything within a context.

stems_affixes.value_cn: [文章等]前后关系;[事件等发生的]背景
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+text编织→共同编织在一起的
pre预先+text编织→预先编好的→借口
text[n.正文,文本;原文;教科书]+book书→n.教科书, 课本

stems_affixes.value_cn: [织物]质地;[材料]构造;结构;肌理
stems_affixes.word_buile: text编织+ure表名词→编织的状态→结构

Sentence.sentence: It can be inferred from the context that the "flip side" (Line 4, Para.
Another aspect of social comparison in the counseling context relates to a technique known as normalizing.

The urgency of slowing down-to find the time and space to think-is nothing new, of course, and wiser souls have always reminded us that the more attention we pay to the moment, the less time and energy we have to place it in some larger context

They should also be seeking individuals who have backgrounds in areas such as political science, the creative arts, history or philosophy, which will allow them to put business decisions into a wider context.

sentences.en: You can always tell the meaning of a word from its context.
sentences.cn: 你常可以从上下文中猜出词义来。

jushi.english: You can always tell the meaning of a word from its context.
jushi.chinese: 你常可以从上下文中猜出词义来。

jushi.english: He always provides a context that makes his characters believable.
jushi.chinese: 他总是能够提供使他的人物形象逼真的背景。
